field.display_name: Use first row as attribute names?
field.note: If enabled, the first row of the CSV file will be used as attribute names for the exposed assets

field.display_name: Use first column as row identifier?
field.note: If enabled, the first column of the CSV file will be used as an identifier for that row.

field.display_name: Enter The Name Of The Shadow Assets
field.note: You can choose the name of the shadow assets. It can either be a normal string or a combination of string and keywords. For example you can enter 'Result Of Query1' or you can enter '%asset_data_source_id%(%asset_short_name%)Result' to have the 'datasourceid(short name of the asset)Result' as the name of your Shadow Asset. Please have a look in the Available Keywords Section and do not forget to enter '%' before and after the keyword or else the keyword is considered as a normal string.

field.display_name: Available Keywords For the Data Source Record Set Asset
field.note: The above are the available keywords for the record set assets. You can choose to have one or more keywords or a combination of strings and keywords as the name of the record set assets. Please remember that the keywords have to be preceded and succeeded with a '%' sign or else it can be considered as a normal string.
